name: Real Off-Road Rickshaw Transport
description:
Adventure Auto Pick & Drop Rickshaw Driving Simulation Challenge Game. Have you ever experience the drive of auto rickshaw on Off Road tracks, if you want to take a crazy drive on tuk tuk let’s try adventure drive on Pick & Drop Rickshaw Simulator games that includes excellent and fun speed driving, parking points, pick and drop service in the real mountain city area.
Off road Chingchi pick & drop is now available to drive on Mountain and urban dirty roads. The heavy engine and unexpected traffic vehicles such as trailer, truck, crazy bikers, farm tractors and local busses on the hill bumpy roads and the sharp turns will gives you a real hill driving experience. So you have to drive be a professional Asian auto rickshaw driver in this thrilling and 3D parking simulator game. Tuk Tuk cannot park itself; it needs an experience driver just like you.
We are sure you will enjoy this latest fun and cool off road chingchi pick & drop career mode Driver Simulator 3D game.Extreme gameplay will show you different driving sceneries varying from off road environments with different season sky (dark, rain, cloudy) in this extreme off road hill tracks and realistic tuk tuk sound. Realistic chingchi controls and physics with detailed village pick & drop hills target climb environment will keep you occupy as a three wheeler duty driver in the tourist rickshaw simulator 2017. Limited time allows for drop off and pick up through different passenger waiting terrains will keep the challenge level high.
Follow the guiding arrows to complete your mission. This taxi driving pick and drop service game surely qualifies as best tuk tuk racer (rickshaw) driving games with extreme shahi swari driving. A unique combination of rickshaw coaches’ simulator and off road quad wheel simulator makes it more interesting and better than many other fun chingchi games that either has only hill driving or tourist tuk tuk driving through the off road tracks.

Off road Super Rickshaw Driver Features:

Different and detailed city rickshaw models
Adventure and thrilling off road hills rickshaw driving experience
GPS map to show passenger waiting at bus stops
Pick passengers and drop on their destination location
Hours of interesting driving fun with rickshaw driving duty
3D graphics and real traffic and rickshaw sound
Limited time so tap accelerator to go fast
Addictive environment with a range of driving targets
Realistic physics and three wheeler driving control
Multiple camera views to enhance driving experience and game play
